summary: "The Apprentice" is an American reality TV show that aired on NBC for 15 seasons. It was hosted by Donald Trump for most of its run. The show followed a group of aspiring business people competing for a job with Trump's company. Contestants were split into teams and given business tasks. The losing team would attend a "boardroom meeting" where one person was eliminated. The Celebrity Apprentice version featured celebrities competing for charity. The show had many international adaptations. Trump was replaced by Arnold Schwarzenegger in 2017 after controversial remarks.
title: The Apprentice (American TV series)
